article_title: Obama Pentagon ISIS Speech WATCH LIVE STREAM VIDEO
article_text:
President Barack Obama is scheduled to deliver remarks on the fight against ISIS from the Pentagon on Monday, July 6. Live coverage of the event will begin at approximately 3:55 p.m. ET.

Watch live stream video below, via NBC News:

[Photo via The White House]
